meanings.sent1: She stood statically in the park, not moving at all.
meanings.sent2: The toy train moved statically around the track, never speeding up or slowing down.
meanings.sent3: The statue in the garden was placed statically, making visitors do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass statically as she waited for the bus, each second feeling like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The air hung statically in the room, heavy and unmoving.

meanings.definition: In a fixed or unchanging manner
meanings.sent1: The price of the product remained statically for months, never fluctuating.
meanings.sent2: The old clock ticked statically on the wall, its hands frozen in time.
meanings.sent3: His hairstyle was styled statically, looking the same every day.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day replayed in his mind statically, never fading or changing.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the scene statically, preserving it for eternity.
